{{< include ../_setup.qmd >}}

```{r}
library(data.table)

instance = readRDS("instance.rds")
```

```{r}
data = as.data.table(instance$archive)

data[, runtime := as.numeric(difftime(timestamp, data$timestamp[1]))/60]
data_100 = data[subsample.frac == 1]
data_100[, best_bacc := cummax(classif.bacc)]
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data_100, aes(x = runtime, y = best_bacc)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()
```
